channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for IA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for IA

item.title: Report X-2023081927
item.description:
Report X-2023081927

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-13T18:13:54+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-25
  • City: DUBUQUE
  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was identified to be leaking internally during trailer unload operations. Package was segregated into a lined tote and set aside in the hazmat cage for processing. DescribePack: Lid on the plastic bottles were not shut tightly. Liquid released through the lid that was not secured. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Package was segregated into a lined tote and set aside in the hazmat cage for processing.

item.title: Report X-2023081215
item.description:
Report X-2023081215

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-13T18:13:54+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-14
  • City: CEDAR RAPIDS
  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was unloaded from trailer. Brought to QA leaking DescribePack: Liquid released from glass jugs. Leaked out of plastic bag that wasn't sealed at all. Soaked through corrugated cardboard box. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Box was placed in lined HazMat totes

item.title: Report X-2023081248
item.description:
Report X-2023081248

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-16T00:32:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-15
  • City: CEDAR RAPIDS
  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Unload manager found package leaking when he opened trailer door. he placed package in a red tote and taken to the hazmat cage. DescribePack: the lid was found popped off and contents leaking. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: package was placed in a red hazmat tote to contain the spill.
